title: Request to ban Name Removed (or whatever his name is) from boards
body:
Spamming boards to get unbanned from a perma, this is getting ridiculous, i made a point of it on his/her most recent post that this is the something like the 10th time in 2 weeks, he's asked to be unbanned.

Just ban him from boards, so i can read funny shitposting, not this "unban me" rubbish

TY

replies.body:
he is definitely being persistent , 

but am unsure if it can be call spam just yet,

but if he does continue to post frequently , or we get more feedback from you guys ,

then we may consider to start issuing warnings , 

and possibly escalating further than that if we need to,.

let me know if you have any further questions :D,
We don't work for Riot, we're just board volunteers. So I only have moderator powers on the boards, I don't have any control over anything going on in the actual game :(
He was toxic, wants to be unbanned 'saying he's not toxic" *shared chat logs* nothing but toxicity... then he abused riot
if he is being this persistent, then he must have a reason to appeal his case
